Blog.post: well...life is shitty...just plain shitty! i have discovered this after 17 years of tourture from my family and friends...but its all gravey baby ;) my theory on life is "live life to its fullest you never know when its gonna end" today i'm going to get a tat...lol it should be rather interesting considering that i'm the biggest chicken you will ever meet when it come to pain...but i'm doing it for a very good reason...i'm not sure what it is yet...but i KNOW there has got to be a good reason... last night my boyfriend and i had a HUGE fight! about me sleeping with some other guy...a guy that i have known my WHOLE life, someone that is like a brother to me! someone that i have loved forever...but never done anything about because i've been scared... he was blaming me for sleeping with him...so i said 'you know what i did sleep with him and it was good'...i didnt but i was mad, REALLY mad, and i didnt feel like putting up with anymore bullshit...really, i didnt! so he hung up on me...and then had the nerve to tell me that he 'loves me' i know he does...and i love him too... i wanted to talk to a friend of mine today (about what had happened last night) ...but friends seem to be bullshit too...just like everything else...friends dont seem to mean anything to me anymore-imagine that right!?!? ill finish updating this later...so...bye xoxo~ samantha

Hey guys, this is my new journal, we were obviously all pissed off by William's actions so we found another web-page that is NOT x-stopped for us to talk about our rants and opinions as our day progresses. Okay, just testing this thing out, I'll start posting more serious subjects at a later time.
